void CloseCHPFile ()

Detailed Description

Provides interfaces to update data in a "Calvin" binary "signal" data file. This class assumes that the file has been completely written and that only existing data groups/sets/rows/cols are being modified.

Definition at line 42 of file CalvinCHPFileUpdater.h.
